Title: Pipe Patching
Description:
Earthquake do number on old pipes. Many start leaking steam everywhere. Especially ones too tall to reach.

<Fourman Grimes points up to the pipes stretching from Gundargaz to the surface.>

Stoneheads not have "approved replacements," but we not have time wait.

Take glue and seal leaks with flappy-flying thing. Made of only best bugs, boiled myself. Will do for today.
ObjectivesText: Fly near the leaks in steam pipes above Gundargaz to seal them with kobold-provided glue.
CompletionText: Try not glue self to pipe, yes?
RewardText:
See? Not need wait. Need action.

You understand.
